summary: Startups is a dynamic category focused on the essentials of launching and growing new businesses. It encompasses a variety of skills, strategies, and personal development tools necessary for entrepreneurs to succeed. Through resources like the course Align the Misaligned, individuals can learn to build confidence, conduct SWOT analysis, and develop strategic networking and resource acquisition techniques, all of which are crucial for startup growth.
excerpt: Aligning the Misaligned involves discovering personal strengths, embracing weaknesses, and conducting SWOT analysis to clarify a startup's position. It hones strategic networking and resource acquisition.
